name: @gerhobbelt/platform
description: A platform detection library that works on nearly all JavaScript platforms.
author: Benjamin Tan <demoneaux@gmail.com> (https://demoneaux.github.io/)

scripts.doc-orig: docdown platform.js doc/README.md style=github title="Platform.js <sup>v${npm_package_version}</sup>" toc=properties url=https://github.com/GerHobbelt/platform.js/blob/${npm_package_version}/platform.js
scripts.doc: docdown platform.js doc/README.md style=github title="Platform.js <sup>v1.3.5-6</sup>" toc=properties url=https://github.com/GerHobbelt/platform.js/blob/1.3.5-6/platform.js
